[[File:Robert S. Blackham.jpg|thumb|Bob Blackham at [[The Return of the Ring]], 2012]]
'''Robert S. Blackham''' is a member of [[The Tolkien Society]] and the [[Birmingham Tolkien Group]]. He gives tours on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in [[Birmingham]] and [[Oxford]], and has written several books about it.
